website_summaries.verdict: These kitchen oil sprayers offer a reliable measure in each spray and are great for outdoor cooking.
pros: Sprays about 1/4 teaspoon in every squirt
Works with a variety of cooking oils
Unbreakable aerosol-free and BPA-free plastic bottles
Comes with labels for basic cooking oils
Works with other liquids like vinegar
cons: Labeling bands are nice, but list two different types of oil on each band, making it difficult if you want to use those two oils in your set

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of money for $37
customer_reviews.text: My second sprayer stopped working after 3 pumps. Total waste of money for $37.
customer_reviews.author: Karin E Challis

customer_reviews.title: First rate spritzers.
customer_reviews.text: These spritzers deliver the right amount of your favorite oils. I love the bands that allow me to identify the type of oil in the sprayer. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This value. Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Easy to hold and use. Only negative is the spray could be a little finer. The ones that give a mist type spray uses less oil per pump and are easier to control.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have in any kitchen I love them and use them daily
customer_reviews.author: Driftin NC

customer_reviews.title: By them you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I know the price is great it works great I don't know what more you could ask for.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made and attractive. We use these all the time with our air fryer.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Vandenbergh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works well would buy this item again / needs a few pumps to get it primed
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: I love them!
customer_reviews.text: I must have received the last one yesterday because I see it is no longer available. I was going to purchase another set for my other oils. I love these spray bottles! Pricey but really great quality! And each spray is a measured 1/4 tsp. I love that I know how much I am spraying.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Mae

customer_reviews.title: The best oil sprayer
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome oil sprayer that is easy to clean and had a strong uniform spray. I love the ease of not having to pump to obtain a good spray for use. Perfect for making kale chips. I have had many other brands and this is by far the best oil sprayer even for the more viscous avocado oil.
customer_reviews.author: nutritionmom

customer_reviews.title: Great Sprayer
customer_reviews.text: Works great for spraying the right amount of oil in vegetables, bread, etc. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Eire

customer_reviews.title: Works well and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I like the concept, the size is perfect for storage, sprayers work well but the bands would be better if the types of oil were not on opposite sides.
customer_reviews.author: Marge T.

customer_reviews.title: ability to control amount of oil used
customer_reviews.text: Not flimsy. Like that it has option for two diff types of spray. It is tinted which good for olive oil. Has reduced my waste of oil because it gives me more control on amount I use.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Layton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love these little sprayer bottles... so easy to use and good spray coverage. Good for salads and marinating..
customer_reviews.author: Pauline P Rovison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They are just the right size and spray well.
customer_reviews.author: Bon

customer_reviews.title: I Love My EVO Sprayer!
customer_reviews.text: I love this EVO sprayer. I like knowing how much oil I am using, each spray is 1/4 teaspoon. If you spray from a distance you get a wider spray and greater coverage of food. Spray close to food and it’s a smaller area that will be covered. My husband likes it to spray on food prior to grilling. I use it for my air fryer and just in general in the kitchen, from sautéing to roasting fresh veggies. And it’s a great way to know how much oil you are adding to a salad.
customer_reviews.author: Floss Boss

product_meta.title: Oil Sprayer Bottle for Cooking, Evo Set Of 2, 8 Ounce Reusable Refillable Spritzer for the Kitchen, BBQ with Funnel, Identification Bands and Informational Card
